title: To You Who Forgot The Night - Novel Updates
author: 은유담
description:
“Who is this woman?” 

 

After waking up at the hospital, Euris encounters a strange woman who comes to him. The woman claims he is her lover, but Euris doesn’t remember the other person at all…

 

“You really like me.”

 

A man who forgot everything and became cold, Euris den Astrian.

 

“You’re… You’re Euris, right?”

 

A woman who remembers everything, Radia Jean.

 

A turbulent time when mystery disappears and everything changes. A man who doesn’t believe in love and a woman who lives with the loss in her heart.

 

『Just, just cry once at my funeral.』 

 

Where will the two lovers end when they start to fall apart?>
